Class ArgumentParser

java.lang.Object
  ArgumentParser

public class ArgumentParser
extends java.lang.Object

Parse the command line arguments, storing into a Hash Map. cmd_args => the Hash Map stores flags as key and values as value

Author:
yxu66

public boolean hasValue(java.lang.String flag)
Check if input command line arguments contains the target flag, and with that flag there is a related value

Parameters:
flag - the target flag
Returns:
